name: European Justice Forum
goal: Our aim is to ensure that the legal environment in Europe protects both consumers and businesses alike, and that those with a legitimate grievance have access to justice. We wish to see a system in which innovation and enterprise can flourish and which enhances the international competitiveness of Europe.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives: Directive on representative actions for the protection of the collective interests of consumers, Product Liability Directive
